prompt: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

cards.name: Harry Potter
cards.bio: The Boy Who Lived, known for his bravery and his connection to Voldemort.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: young wizard with a lightning scar on his forehead, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Hermione Granger
cards.bio: Brilliant and bookish, Hermione is the brains of the trio and always has a spell ready.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: young witch with bushy brown hair, holding a book, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Ron Weasley
cards.bio: Harry's loyal friend, known for his humor and chess skills.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: young wizard with red hair, holding a chess piece, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Neville Longbottom
cards.bio: Clumsy but courageous, Neville grows into a hero over time.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: young wizard with a round face, holding a toad, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Draco Malfoy
cards.bio: Slytherin student and Harry's rival, known for his cunning and ambition.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: young wizard with blonde hair, sneering, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Rubeus Hagrid
cards.bio: The half-giant gamekeeper with a love for magical creatures.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: large bearded man with a lantern, standing next to a giant dog, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Albus Dumbledore
cards.bio: Wise and powerful, the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: old wizard with long beard and half-moon spectacles, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Severus Snape
cards.bio: The mysterious potions master with a hidden agenda.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: wizard with black hair and a hooked nose, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Minerva McGonagall
cards.bio: Deputy headmistress and head of Gryffindor, known for her strict but fair demeanor.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: witch with square spectacles and a green robe, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Fred and George Weasley
cards.bio: The mischievous twin brothers known for their pranks and jokes.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: twin wizards with red hair, holding joke items, Harry Potter theme

cards.name: Lord Voldemort
cards.bio: The Dark Lord, the main villain of the story, seeking immortality and power.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: dark wizard with pale skin and snake-like features, Harry Potter theme
